segments.text: No , thanks . I've decided to give up smoking .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , it's just that I think if you don't enjoy doing something any more , you should stop doing it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see.You mean you don't enjoy smoking any more ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's right . You should give it up , too.It ' s bad for your health .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Stop talking like my mother . That's what she keeps saying .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But it's true . It's a nasty habit . I can't think why I ever started.Anyway , it's obviously got you in its grip !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you mean ? What are you talking about ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I mean you couldn't give it up !
segments.speaker: S2
